channel.title: GitHub GLSL Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of GLSL in GitHub

item.title: hackr-sh/ghostty-shaders
item.description: A repository containing many free shaders to use with ghostty (the terminal)

item.description: Enhanced OS for the TrimUI Smart Pro

item.title: KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross
item.description: SPIRV-Cross is a practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.

item.description: Step-by-step guide through the abstract and complex universe of Fragment Shaders.

item.title: SaschaWillems/Vulkan
item.description: C++ examples for the Vulkan graphics API
